allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
fix(deployment): resolve zeabur deployment issues

- Change Prisma provider from postgresql to sqlite for simpler deployment
- Fix TypeScript type errors in mock-data and page components
- Update zeabur.yaml to use SQLite database configuration
- Add proper type definitions for MockUser, MockDemand, MockService
- Ensure all required fields are present in mock data
- Fix userId undefined handling in mutual-aid page

Build now passes successfully and deployment should work on Zeabur
EOF
)")
